name: auto-mart3
description: Auto Mart is an online marketplace for automobiles of diverse makes, model or body type. With Auto Mart, users can sell their cars or buy from trusted dealerships or private sellers

scripts.testdb: cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node --require @babel/register server/database/db Droptables && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node --require @babel/register server/database/db Createtables && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node --require @babel/register server/database/db Adminindex && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register --timeout 10000 --exit  server/tests/*.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing node --require @babel/register server/database/db Droptables
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --require @babel/register server/database/db Createtables && node --require @babel/register server/database/db Adminindex && nodemon --exec babel-node --presets @babel/preset-env server/server.js
